text:
Problem 2.3

Sharing Smoothie Bars: More Ratios

Smoothies are a popular drink full of nutrition. So a new company near Academy Middle School decides to make smoothie bars. Since they contain fruits, vegetables, and protein, the cafeteria at Academy offers them for lunch,

Academy Middle School has invited some first grades to visit their class. They plan on providing smoothie bars as a treat. The bars come in different sizes with segments that make them easy to share.

Sofia suggests an idea for sharing. She says. "Someone who is 12 years old should get more than someone who is 6 years old. So your age should determine how much of the bar you get."
